DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety of ziprasidone and risperidone for the treatment of schizophrenia in Chinese patients
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Ziprasidone and Risperidone for the Treatment of Schizophrenia in Chinese Patients
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patients with schizophrenia Miminum PANSS score of 60 when randomized Planned, regular use of antipsyhotics within 1 week of randomization Previous treatment with risperidone that resulted in intolerance or lack of response to risperidone
